ygData.subject: Re: Lute of the Gypsy Princess *SPOILER*
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/16/99 10:30:42 AM EST, j@lumiere.net writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/16/99 10:30:42 AM EST, j@... writes:

<< I found out about this quest a few days ago and have been trying to
complete it (since I have a lute in the bank). Unfortunately, while I know
I won't have trouble finding Lord Grimrot >>

Well i found him in SK and was messing around with him , but the only thing i
can get out of him is this stuff about pestilence and his scythe and what
not. for kicks i tried all different kinds of phrases but got nothing. Is
this really the right guy to start the quest?
